### MicroProbe: Efficient Reliability Assessment for Foundation Models with Minimal Data


üß† **AI ADVANCEMENT**


The article titled "MicroProbe: Efficient Reliability Assessment for Foundation Models with Minimal Data" presents a novel approach for evaluating the reliability of foundation models when faced with minimal data availability. The proposed method, MicroProbe, significantly reduces the resources and data required to assess the robustness and dependability of these models. It leverages sophisticated techniques to efficiently probe and analyze model performance, identifying potential vulnerabilities and weaknesses with a high degree of accuracy. This innovative strategy addresses the growing need for efficient evaluation tools in the deployment and

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://arxiv.org/abs/2512.20630?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_4482)**

### LastPass 2022 Breach Led to Years-Long Cryptocurrency Thefts, TRM Labs Finds


üõ°Ô∏è **SECURITY ALERT**


The 2022 LastPass security breach has been linked to a series of cryptocurrency thefts that spanned several years, according to a report by TRM Labs. Hackers managed to exploit the breach to gain unauthorized access to sensitive data, which they subsequently used to carry out fraudulent activities in the cryptocurrency market. TRM Labs' investigation revealed that the breach had far-reaching consequences, affecting numerous victims, as cybercriminals leveraged the stolen information to execute complex theft schemes. The report underscores the significant impact

**[Read the full article ‚Ä∫](https://thehackernews.com/2025/12/lastpass-2022-breach-led-to-years-long.html?utm_source=newsletter&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=weekly_ai_cybersecurity&utm_content=article_6124)**
